category: news
title: "IBM misses on sales, but strong earnings and bullish forecast drive its stock higher"
excerpt: "IBM Corp. narrowly missed revenue expectations for the first quarter but strong earnings results and strength in its software business helped drive shares up nearly 2% in after-hours trading. The enterprise computing giant reiterated its full-year outlook of revenue growth in the 3% to 5% range while cautioning that there could be some weakness in its consulting business."
